casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
John Michael REBER. No. 196P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Anne Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Reber. Laura Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 641 S.E.2d 742 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th day of April 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of October 2007."
